articles.author: Alexandra Skores, Jillian Sykes
articles.title: United Airlines halts departures for ‘technology issue’ - CNN
articles.description: A “technology issue” that halted United Airlines mainline flights out of departure airports Wednesday night has been resolved, the airline told CNN.

articles.author: Ryan Whitwam
articles.title: Google search boss says AI isn’t killing search clicks - Ars Technica
articles.description: Liz Reid says Google’s data shows AI is generating consistent clicks and better experiences.

articles.title: Public health experts dismayed by RFK Jr.'s defunding of mRNA vaccine research : Shots - Health News - NPR
articles.description: The Trump administration canceled about $500 million for research into mRNA vaccines. The move slows progress in using the technology to prevent a future pandemic or treat disease, experts say.

articles.title: Instagram takes on Snapchat with new ‘Instagram Map’ - TechCrunch
articles.description: Instagram notes that location sharing is off by default on Instagram Map, and a user's location only updates when they open the app, meaning it doesn't provide real-time location updates.
